Text.Page: When we lost our flight platform, we constructed a series of improvised transport devices. Without those, we'd never risk leaving Kanstria.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"How do they work?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Honestly, they're not all that different from teleportals. We lacked the raw magical power to build a full-on teleportal network, so we created these teleport platforms. We use iteris shards to power them, and those aren't too hard to mine.

Head out and acquire an iteris shard. I hope you're proficient at mining."I've cracked a few rocks in my time."

Excellent. I'll meet you at the {@LinkCreature:249#1101}.

Good luck!

Good. You found it.

South of here is the {@Rgn:49002}. The argons use them to siphon energy from the fields. You'll need to mine iteris shards from {@Collection:149} before you can use the platform.

Come find me again once you have an iteris shard.

Now, use the shard to activate the teleport platform.

I'll see you in Kanstria.
It's not easy to mine for shards, but keep at it. You'll get it.

Well done!

The teleport platforms help us outmaneuver the argons. Pretty clever, don't you think?
